hey guys well tonight was i think the best night of my life the past few days was really hard on me i cut i smoked i did all that shit i regret it now i wish i didnt do any of that shit but tonight was special tonight i smiled because kellie my fiancee told me that she loves me and im never gonna hurt her ever again NEVER people might say there little bullshit theorys about us not making it or whatever but fuck them let them believe what they want because i know that me nd kellie are true because if we werent i wouldnt stay up all fucking night crying for the past 4 days so this is final no more cheating no more flirting no more lies no more of the old me as of right now im gonna change into a more responsible person kellie is my fiancee damnit and its time i treat her like she is kellie baby i love you with all my heart we will have 2 kids together and 1 dog with a nice house i just kant wait till that day fucking comes im counting them days within not even 2 more years we will walk the isle and we will be considered married and you will have my last name i love you kellie marie peplinski(soon to be)parent i love you with all my heart and whoever tries to step in between that i got something to tell you
FUCK OFF IM NOT FALLING FOR IT I LOVE HER WITH ALL MY FUCKING HEART GOT THAT =) well thats my entry comment plz

i hate this i got cuts on my arms no life to live nothing to live for my mom wants to take me off my meds i shown her the cuts on my arms and i told her it will so much worse if she did that maybe i miss HER maybe i realized that i cant live without HER i wish i didnt do them regretful things to HER im just tired of living like this last night i was out all night thinking of HER wishing she was with me to whipe my tears away nd make everything so much better i dunno i just wish thing were the same like b4 im sorry world for being the way i am

hmmm its been about a fucking month and a half since i updated this thing well heres how its been going i signed up for my ged classes they are kinda fucking retarded but i guess i will go me nd kellie get into it all the time its starting to make me wonder is she the right one there for me oh well we will see the other night samantha schlenger called me....it was an interesting convo i would state it but no one needs to know about that she called me the same day 1 year ago since we met its insane i dunno tho welp i gotta go im listening to musik and jus thtinking i will keep updating

What would you say to God when you saw him? Would you ask him why we are here? I guess i would ask him why he made love so hard. Never could tell why people do things but its even harder to tell when that person is in love. This hopeless romantic is just sitting back painting life as he sees it.

well here goes my nightmare im losing everyone or pushing them away lately ive been a dick to everyone and i kno its true because my own best friend my brother said so alan im sorry your like my brother a little brother that i never had i wish i never did this shit to you im really sorry your right im a dickhead and im fucked up but all i can do now is say that im sorry

hi guys well lets see i havent updated for about a few days so lemme fill you in 2 days ago i drank with my homie travis nick skipped school and he took a cup of apple juice and some vodka in it (wadda light weight) travis had some with orange juice i drank it straight and thats about all i did other than i tore my room to peices i ripped everything off the walls because so many memories are there but there is one thing i didnt rip down my icp poster samantha bought me last year i dunno why i cant rip it down but i just cant and yesterday i drank AGAIN wit travis hes pretty cool i guess hes been helping me out with my problems i just need to reasure people that this is who i am if im gonna drink im gonna drink if they have a problem with it get out of my life and today i drank some more and now im here drunk off my ass bored cuz no one wants to hang out wit me while everyones in school so =( alright well comment

BillBill
whoop whoop

hmmm lets see the past 2 days have been alright i guess a couple days ago i wanted to die i heard shit about my girl that i hope really aint true ive been hearing alot of things about her i dunno what to do anymore so i decided to drink to see if the pain would go away it did but then it came back i dunno how to get rid of this pain anymore it hurts hearing shit oh well and yesterday was alright till my girlfriend said she wanted to walk infront of a car that shit really pisses me off because she dont need to be saying that i dont say that im gonna cut myself but oh well then i went to the hockey rink and she gave this attitude other than that it was cool i played hockey at millroad i owned in goal i did better than the other goalie so its cool and i drank again today =) a liter of vodka welp
im out 

BILLBILL whoop whoop

the past 4 days have been a living hell it feels like im losing alot of things i dunno why my brother went back to alabama because of me hes a 3 time fellan which means that if he gets arrested here he will do life in prison and im the one who ratted him out for something and he couldve gotten locked up its my fault that he left now my family is angry/upset wit me i had no choice in the matter than i hear shit from alot of people and its really beginning to piss me off but oh well i cant tell everyone to stfu about shit because all they are gonna do is keep talking and its just gonna get worse today i chilled wit travis man hes like my little bro i knew him almost my whole life thats my crime buddy i dunno we changed now its like the old times with new personallitys after that i came home slept and well now here i am i have been thinking of suicide alot how easy and painless it would be just to cut or pop pills i dunnno i dont wanna do it but all this shit is making me want to
http://imbillbill.livejournal.com/1030.html

Wadda day jesus christ ive been busy all day well lets see i woke up at 2 in the morning after sleeping for 12 hours ^^ its great sleeping in again anyway i woke up and i went to the school at 630 after that i was about to get into a fight with someone there because they like running their mouth...oh well after that i came home got bitch at like always by my mom and after that i went out looking for a job i put an app in super wawa rite aid and acme hopefully i get a job then i went to the school to set up my G.E.D classes and now im getting ready to go to the police station so they can arrested me file and press charges on me and release me...see i dunno why they make it such a hassle to give someone charges why cant they just fucking call me and give it to me oh well im out later

hey this is my first entry =) well today just been gay for me all i did was sleep wake up go to the school in the morning walk home get into a big fight and go home and sleep it sucks everywhere i go i get jumped or into a fight or someone doesnt like me its nearly impossible for me to live a life of a happy fearless man because everywhere i go somebody doesnt like me tomorrow will prolly be the same i just feel like i dont wanna be here anymore everything makes me rot inside and it hurts knowing that everywhere i go im gonna get into a fight or an argument maybe i should go back to crisis maybe i should move maybe i should just stay dormanted in my house for the rest of my life i dunno it just makes me sick knowing all these people dont like me when i did nothing wrong to them oh well im going to bed comment or something later
